a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Time spent on unpaid care and domestic work, women vs. men, 2022
The average share of each day that women and men aged 15 and older spend on unpaid care and domestic

text.textPath: Equal time spent on care and domestic work
Equal time spent on care and domestic work

text.tspan: Data source: UN Statistics Division and UN WOMEN
Note: Unpaid care and domestic work includes: food preparation, dishwashing, upkeep of a dwelling, laundry, ironing, gardening, caring
for pets, shopping, servicing and repair of personal and household goods, childcare, and care of the sick, elderly or disabled household
